key.name: close-overview
key.description: Close automattically the overview each time an item is clicked.

key.name: enable-search
key.description: Provide a search entry to filter the lists added tothe menus.

key.name: use-submenu-bookmarks
key.summary: Show places bookmarks in a submenu
key.description: Putting bookmarks in a submenu allows you to scroll the list, so "True" is recommended if many places are bookmarked.

key.name: max-recents
key.summary: Max number of recent file per app
key.description: The maximum number of recent files that should be displayed on the menu for apps who can open files.

key.name: use-submenu-recent
key.summary: Show recent files in a submenu
key.description: Putting recent files in a submenu allows you to scroll the list, so "True" is recommended if many recent files are displayed.

key.name: use-submenu-webfav
key.summary: Show web favorites in a submenu
key.description: Putting web favorites in a submenu allows you to scroll the list, so "True" is recommended if many websites are favorited.
